com.thunken.numanuma

Class EnumSets

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thunken.numanuma.EnumSets

  • public class EnumSets
extends Object
    Utility methods for working with EnumSet and other bit vectors.
    See Also:
    Enum, EnumSet, BitSet

      EnumSets()

      • EnumSets

        public EnumSets()

    • Method Detail

      • ofBitFlag

        public static <E extends Enum<E>> EnumSet<E> ofBitFlag(int bitFlag,
                                                       @NonNull
                                                       Class<E> elementType)
        Creates an EnumSet initialized from the specified int-based bit flag. For each set bit in the bit flag, the Enum constant with the corresponding Enum.ordinal() is added to the EnumSet.
        Type Parameters:
        E - The type of the elements in the EnumSet.
        Parameters:
        bitFlag - The int-based bit flag from which to initialize the EnumSet.
        elementType - The class object of the element type for the specified Enum.
        Returns:
        An EnumSet initialized from the specified int-based bit flag.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the bit flag contains set bits with indices greater than the Enum constants' maximum Enum.ordinal().
        NullPointerException - If elementType is null.

      • ofBitSet

        public static <E extends Enum<E>> EnumSet<E> ofBitSet(@NonNull
                                                      BitSet bitSet,
                                                      @NonNull
                                                      Class<E> elementType)
        Creates an EnumSet initialized from the specified BitSet. For each set bit in the BitSet, the Enum constant with the corresponding Enum.ordinal() is added to the EnumSet.
        Type Parameters:
        E - The type of the elements in the EnumSet.
        Parameters:
        bitSet - The BitSet from which to initialize the EnumSet.
        elementType - The class object of the element type for the specified Enum.
        Returns:
        An EnumSet initialized from the specified BitSet.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the BitSet contains set bits with indices greater than the Enum constants' maximum Enum.ordinal().
        NullPointerException - If bitSet or elementType is null.

      • toBitFlag

        public static <E extends Enum<E>> int toBitFlag(@NonNull
                                                EnumSet<E> enumSet)
        Creates an int-based bit flag initialized from the specified EnumSet. For each element in the EnumSet, the bit corresponding to the element's Enum.ordinal() is set.
        Type Parameters:
        E - The type of the elements in the EnumSet.
        Parameters:
        enumSet - The EnumSet from which to initialize the bit flag.
        Returns:
        An int-based bit flag initialized from the specified EnumSet.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If enumSet is null.

      • toBitSet

        public static <E extends Enum<E>> BitSet toBitSet(@NonNull
                                                  EnumSet<E> enumSet)
        Creates a BitSet initialized from the specified EnumSet. For each element in the EnumSet, the bit corresponding to the element's Enum.ordinal() is set.
        Type Parameters:
        E - The type of the elements in the EnumSet.
        Parameters:
        enumSet - The EnumSet from which to initialize the BitSet.
        Returns:
        A BitSet initialized from the specified EnumSet.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If enumSet is null.
